name: Patricia B. Davis
title: Director of Education
bio: Patricia Brown Denis serves as the Director of Education at Cornerstone Deliverance and Development Ministries for Christ, Inc. She is a professional writer, journalist, community organizer, and political activist. She has served nearly 23 years of experience as an educator, while also using her gifted writing ability as a grant writer and book reviewer.

She has a Bachelor's degree in Journalism from Ohio Wesleyan University and a Master's degree in Curriculum and Instruction from the University of Phoenix. In addition to teaching, she runs a business providing writing and editing services, event planning, and project management. She also writes a featured column in the ONYX Magazine, and is co-founder of Girls with Audacity, Inc. a not-for-profit organization actively involved in transformative work in the lives of nearly 50 young ladies.
Denis and her husband also serve as facilitators for small group educational enrichment workshops for their home church.
